statements: SELECT * FROM battery_metrics LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, battery_serial_number, temperature FROM battery_metrics WHERE voltage > 4.5;
SELECT battery_serial_number, current FROM battery_metrics ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT id, charge_status FROM battery_metrics WHERE voltage < 3.0 AND current > 1.0;
SELECT AVG(voltage) AS avg_voltage, AVG(current) AS avg_current FROM battery_metrics;
SELECT id, battery_serial_number, voltage FROM battery_metrics WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY voltage DESC, id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM battery_metrics WHERE charge_status IN('Charging', 'Discharging') ORDER BY temperature, current DESC;
SELECT id, battery_serial_number, voltage, temperature, charge_status FROM battery_metrics WHERE voltage >= 4.00 AND temperature < 25 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT MAX(voltage) AS max_voltage, MIN(temperature) AS min_temperature FROM battery_metrics;
SELECT AVG(voltage) AS avg_voltage, SUM(current) AS total_current FROM battery_metrics WHERE temperature > 20 ORDER BY avg_voltage DESC;
SELECT * FROM Electric_Vehicle_Batteries;
SELECT battery_id, manufacturer FROM Electric_Vehicle_Batteries ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT battery_id, capacity FROM Electric_Vehicle_Batteries WHERE capacity > 50;
SELECT * FROM Battery_Performance_Metrics WHERE cycle_count < 100 ORDER BY charging_efficiency DESC;
SELECT battery_id, discharging_time FROM Battery_Performance_Metrics WHERE discharging_time > '02:00:00';
SELECT * FROM Electric_Vehicle_Batteries LIMIT 10;
SELECT manufacturer, capacity FROM Electric_Vehicle_Batteries WHERE cycle_life > 100;
SELECT battery_id, manufacturer, capacity, cycle_life FROM Electric_Vehicle_Batteries ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, charging_time, discharging_time FROM Electric_Vehicle_Batteries AS evb JOIN Battery_Performance_Metrics AS bpm ON evb.battery_id = bpm.battery_id;
SELECT AVG(capacity) AS avg_capacity, AVG(cycle_life) AS avg_cycle_life FROM Electric_Vehicle_Batteries;
SELECT * FROM BatteryMetrics;
SELECT brand, capacity FROM BatteryMetrics WHERE charging_time IS NULL;
SELECT battery_id, brand, capacity, charging_time FROM BatteryMetrics ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM BatteryHealth WHERE cycles_completed > 100 AND temperature < 40;
SELECT history_id, battery_id, date, charging_cycles, discharging_cycles FROM BatteryHistory WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM BatteryMetrics;
SELECT brand, capacity FROM BatteryMetrics ORDER BY brand ASC;
SELECT * FROM BatteryHealth WHERE cycles_completed > 100 ORDER BY temperature DESC;

SELECT BatteryHistory.battery_id, BatteryMetrics.brand, BatteryHistory.date FROM BatteryHistory INNER JOIN BatteryMetrics ON BatteryHistory.battery_id = BatteryMetrics.battery_id WHERE BatteryHistory.charging_cycles > 50 AND BatteryHistory.discharging_cycles < 20;
SELECT health_id, health_status FROM BatteryHealth WHERE health_status LIKE 'Good%' ORDER BY health_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM battery_metrics;
SELECT manufacturer, capacity FROM battery_metrics WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT location, num_chargers FROM charging_stations ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT battery_id, start_time, end_time FROM charge_cycles WHERE kWh_charged < 50 ORDER BY end_time DESC;
SELECT error_id, error_message FROM battery_errors WHERE battery_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM battery_metrics WHERE capacity > 500 ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT cycle_id, start_time, end_time, kWh_charged FROM charge_cycles WHERE kWh_charged BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY kWh_charged DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, capacity, charging_speed FROM battery_metrics WHERE manufacturer = 'Tesla' AND charging_speed > 50;
SELECT location, num_chargers, operator FROM charging_stations WHERE num_chargers >= 5 AND operator = 'EVStation';
SELECT error_id, error_message, error_timestamp FROM battery_errors WHERE error_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY error_timestamp;
SELECT * FROM battery_metrics ORDER BY battery_id ASC;
SELECT manufacturer, capacity FROM battery_metrics WHERE voltage > 10 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT temperature, battery_id FROM battery_metrics WHERE capacity < 5000 ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM charging_history WHERE charging_duration > 60 ORDER BY charging_power ASC;
SELECT date, efficiency FROM usage_records WHERE distance_covered > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM battery_metrics WHERE manufacturer = 'Tesla';
SELECT charging_power, charging_duration FROM charging_history WHERE charging_power > 100 AND charging_duration <= 60;
SELECT date, distance_covered FROM usage_records ORDER BY distance_covered DESC;
SELECT battery_id, temperature FROM battery_metrics WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY battery_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM health_status WHERE status = 'Good' AND date > '2022-01-01';
